|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G200TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 2165 |nqam2 = 1000 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = 1000 |rad3n = 600 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM [[Alpha Networks]] [http://www.alphanetworks.com/en/product_detail/9e597323cf0f4230 ''WRG-AC40''] - Wireless AC5300 Tri-Band Router *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.technuter.com/pc-pheripharels/networking/broadcom-announces-industrys-most-advanced-5g-wifi-router-platform.html '''BCM4709C0'''] @1.4 GHz DualCore (ARM Cortex-A9)
===Features=== <small> *Five core processor (“pentacore”) to realize maximum speeds delivers over 3.8 GHz :*[[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0 @1.4GHz Dual core ARM Cortex-A9 host processor :*Three BCM4366 4×4 radios, each with an integrated @800MHz A7 CPU for Wi-Fi processing *4 Gbps aggregate PHY rate, eight stream capability at 5 GHz with 4 stream capability at 2.4 GHz *Extended 5 GHz support adds three additional 80 MHz channels and two 160 MHz channels *Zero-wait dynamic frequency selection (DFS) enables greater access and better use of cleaner 5 GHz Wi-Fi channels resulting in faster downloads, higher quality Ultra HD streams and ability to connect to more devices *Intelligent auto channel selection ensures that the most optimal channel is selected while maintaining a seamless end user experience *Broadcom’s SmartConnect software automatically ensures that 802.11ac devices in the home are not sharing airtime with slower Wi-Fi devices *Explicit Tx Beamforming and AnyBeam provide extended reach for critical video streaming links *Broadcom’s standards compliance ensures interoperability with currently shipping and future 802.11ac-based devices *High-performance networked attached storage capability with the ability to deliver up to 1 Gbps NAS performance *Broadcom’s Intelligent Quality of Service (iQoS) software identifies incoming traffic and allocates bandwidth so that streaming applications get the highest priority while other applications, like file downloads, run at a lower priority </small> ===Specifications=== :[http://core0.staticworld.net/images/article/2015/01/dir-895l-100538539-orig.png Specification] *[http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 CPU: BCM47094] *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''Anandtech''']
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32733-broadcom-announces-mu-mimo-tri-band-architecture On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] - ''AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bnews%5D-networking-@-ces-2015-a-4930900.html ''CES 2015'' on '''HardwareZone'''] :[[D-Link DIR-885L/R]] - ''AC3100 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link DIR-890L rev A1|D-Link DIR-890L/R]] - ''AC3200 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link DIR-895L/R]] - ''AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' :[[D-Link DWA-192]] - ''AC1900 Wi-Fi USB Adapter'' [http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac1900-wi-fi-usb-adapter/ PPage] (US) :USB 3.0, 3T3R 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz 600+1300Mbps)
